SEARCH
Module sc2002.scmb.grp1.hms
Package controller

Class AppointmentOutcomeController

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentOutcomeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentOutcomeService
public class AppointmentOutcomeController extends Object implements AppointmentOutcomeService
Controller class for managing appointment outcomes. Provides functionality for creating, viewing, and updating appointment outcomes, including medication prescriptions.
